videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #01 - Introduction
videos.description: Learn about the css language and who you must learn it to design the web

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #02 - Syntax and How to Write Css Code
videos.description: Learn about Css Syntax and how to write the css code

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #03 - Element Styling
videos.description:
Learn about class & id and how to style elements with it 

Comparison between class & id 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cl-xDbiTlz0

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #04 - Element Background
videos.description:
Everything about Background property
background-color
background-image
background-repeat
background-attachment
background-position

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #05 - Text Part 1
videos.description:
Learn about text format and properties part 1
color / direction / letter-spacing / line-height / text-align

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #06 - Text Part 2
videos.description:
Learn about text format and properties part 2
text-decoration / text-indent / text-transform / white-space / word-spacing

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #07 - Font Properties
videos.description:
Learn about font properties and how to use it 
font-family / font-size / font-style / font-weight

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #08 - Links
videos.description:
Learn about Links properties and how to deal with it
anchor
:hover
:active

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #09 - Lists Properties
videos.description: Learn everything about Lists properties

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #10 - Box Model Properties
videos.description: Learn about Box Model properties and how to deal with elements

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #11 - Border
videos.description: Learn everything about elements border and the short code

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #12 - Margin
videos.description: Learn about elements margin

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #13 - Padding
videos.description: Learn everything about elements padding

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #14 - Dimensions - Width / Height
videos.description:
Learn everything about elements dimensions and properties
Width
Height
Min-Width
Min-Height
Max-Width
Max-Height

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #15 - Display - Inline / Block / None / Inline-Block
videos.description:
Learn everything about Display Property and its value
inline
block
none
inline-block

Another full detailed video describing the difference
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHAL9HNwziQ

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #16 - Position - Static, Fixed, Relative, Absolute [ Css 2 ]
videos.description:
Learn everything about positioning the element and how position work in css

Another full detailed video showing the defference between all Positions properties
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jtg4u2-aV-w

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #17 - Float - Left, Right, None and Clear

Learn everything about elements float and clearing and how it done

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #18 - Grouping Similar Selectos
videos.description: Learn everything about grouping selectors

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #19 - Nesting and How it Work
videos.description: Learn everything about elements Nesting and how it work

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #20 - Overflow - Visible, Hidden, Scroll, Auto [ Css 2 ]

Visible
Auto
Scroll

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #21 - Visibility - Visible, Hidden [ Css 2 ]
videos.description:
Learn everything about visibility property and its values
Hidden, Visible 
and whats the deference between
visibility: hidden
display: none

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #22 - Z index - Auto, Number [ Css 2 ]
videos.description: Learn everything about z-index property and dealing with layers and how to control elements view on layer

videos.description:
Learn how to use content to add content to elements 
and how to use with

videos.description:

videos.title: Learn Css in Arabic #25 - Outline - Width, Style, Color [ Css 2 ]

videos.description: Learn everything about selectors and how to deal with elements

videos.description:

before

videos.description: Learn about Media in Css and how to control every Media
